value:
Though I know they're from other
worlds, seeing multiple Pallas and
Ests here still feels quite strange...

I went all the way from Archanea to
Valentia, looking for my sister... And
that's how I met Celica.

With all these...unique...Heroes under
your command, how are you not
always exhausted by their antics?$k$pI ask because, having a free-spirited
younger sister, I feel like I can relate...

I'd like to acclimate my pegasus to
the sights and sounds of this world...
Any suggestion on where to start?

Huh? Oh, no, I'm not looking for
anyone right now. I'm just out on
a walk, that's all...

Ah! Glad I finally found you. You're
$Nu, right?

YES! Er... Excuse me. I shouldn't get
so excited...

Ah, a result to match the effort.
Satisfactory.

I've disappointed even myself.
Forgive me...

With this, I'll protect you, and this
world, without fail!

I'm Catria. My younger sister was
kidnapped by pirates... Might I find
her in this world, I wonder?

I traveled from Archanea to Valentia
searching for Est, and now I find
myself in Askr... My head is spinning!$k$pPalla always says new places lead
to new faces...and I'm sure Est is
ecstatic exploring new places...$k$pWhy am I so different? Sometimes
it makes me wish I'd been born a bit
more carefree...$k$pWishing won't make it so, though...
And besides, I've come to accept that
who I am now isn't all that bad.$k$pAfter all...I see a bit of myself in you.
The glue that binds Heroes together...
It may be hard, but we'll do our best!
せいっ
消えて！
うっ…
しまった…！
Is that all?
Move!
I've got this!
I'll protect you!
Oh, no...
Heehee...
I am Catria. I'm looking for my sister. Have you seen her?
Eeek! ... Grrr... Do you enjoy doing things like that?
I'm so proud of Palla, my older sister. She's the best of the Pegasus Knights, and so kind.
My little sister Est is, well...spoiled. She does whatever she likes. OK, I'm a bit jealous.
Macedon, Valentia, Askr... Where will I go next?
Is Prince Marth in this world, too? No, no, no... Now's not the time.
I can learn a lot from watching you, I can tell. I'd like to stick close to you, if that's all right.
Sure.
Oh?
I won't lose.
